comments:
I was successfully using the DBEdit & Rational XDE Tester plugins in
compatibility mode as of build M8. Sometime thereafter, they stopped working.
Here is my metadata log if it helps.

!SESSION May 01, 2004 00:49:22.390 ---------------------------------------------

The xerces plugin was removed in M8. You will need to update your plugin pre-
reqs to no longer require xerces. JDL 1.4 comes with xml parsers built-in, so 
xerces is redundant.
